malaria.title: Malaria Test
malaria.problem: In Africa, malaria remains one of the leading causes of child mortality. In remote areas, limited access to healthcare and late diagnosis worsen cases.
malaria.solution: AfiaAI enables early malaria diagnosis through AI-powered symptom analysis, making rapid intervention possible.

skin.title: Skin Detection
skin.problem: Skin diseases affect millions of Africans, but lack of dermatologists and stigma often delay consultations.
skin.solution: Our image analysis technology quickly identifies common skin conditions and recommends appropriate actions.
